common_issues.title: Extended Payment Terms
common_issues.description: Payment terms exceeding 60 days strain SME cash flow
common_issues.impact: Cash flow strain, difficulty meeting operational expenses
common_issues.recommendation: Negotiate for Net 30 or Net 45 payment terms

common_issues.title: Unilateral Termination Rights
common_issues.description: One-sided termination clauses without adequate notice
common_issues.impact: Business disruption, loss of revenue, stranded investments
common_issues.recommendation: Ensure mutual termination rights with adequate notice period

common_issues.title: Unlimited Liability
common_issues.impact: Potential bankruptcy, personal asset risk for proprietors
common_issues.recommendation: Negotiate liability cap equal to contract value

common_issues.title: Full IP Transfer
common_issues.description: Complete transfer of intellectual property rights
common_issues.impact: Loss of valuable IP, inability to reuse work
common_issues.recommendation: Retain license to use deliverables, protect background IP

common_issues.title: Broad Non-Compete
common_issues.impact: Inability to work in chosen field, limited business opportunities
common_issues.recommendation: Limit geographic scope and duration (12-24 months max)

common_issues.title: Hidden Auto-Renewal
common_issues.description: Automatic renewal with short opt-out window
common_issues.impact: Locked into unwanted contracts, unexpected costs
common_issues.recommendation: Set calendar reminders, negotiate longer opt-out periods

common_issues.title: Inconvenient Jurisdiction
common_issues.description: Dispute resolution in distant or foreign location
common_issues.impact: High legal costs, practical difficulty in disputes
common_issues.recommendation: Negotiate for local jurisdiction or online dispute resolution

common_issues.title: One-Sided Confidentiality
common_issues.description: Only one party bound by confidentiality
